question_answer_list.question: Tell me a bit about yourself

question_answer_list.question: What are you looking for in your next role?
question_answer_list.answer: So you can play the recording. I will just for now just speak for some more time. Yes. And that's where the speech to text part comes in. So we are then converting it to text because it's easier for the other.
